amendment.description: Amendment adds sense of Congress language regarding an approach to excluding so-called "exceptional events" (like massive dust storms that are not controllable or preventable) from determinations of whether an area is in compliance with the coarse particulate matter standard.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-317 to add sense of Congress language regarding an approach to excluding so-called `exceptional events' (like massive dust storms that are not controllable or preventable) from determinations of whether an area is in compliance with the coarse particulate matter standard.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Flake.
